mapper.select: SELECT P.PACKAGE_CODE AS CODE, P.PACKAGE_NAME AS NAME , P.PACKAGE_START AS TIME_START, P.PACKAGE_END AS TIME_END , P.PACKAGE_PRICE AS PRICE FROM PACKAGE P JOIN PACKAGE_FORM PF ON P.PACKAGE_FORM_CODE = PF.PACKAGE_FORM_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN PACKAGE_REMOVE PR ON P.PACKAGE_CODE = PR.PACKAGE_CODE WHERE PF.LOC_CODE = #{locationCode} AND PR.PACKAGE_REMOVE_CODE IS NULL ORDER BY P.PACKAGE_START
SELECT CODE, APPLY_CODE, NAME , TIME_START, TIME_END , PRICE, APPLY_DATE FROM APPLY_PACKAGE_VIEW WHERE BOOK_CODE IS NULL
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO APPLY_PACKAGE(APPLY_PACKAGE_CODE, PACKAGE_CODE, APPLY_DATE) VALUES(F_CODE('AP', AP_SEQ.NEXTVAL), #{code}, TO_DATE(#{apply_date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'))
